result.reason: The 'VNCViewOnly' property already exists in the connection configuration but is not hooked up to the UI or the VNC protocol implementation.
result.approach: Connect the existing 'VNCViewOnly' property in 'AbstractConnectionRecord.cs' to the VNC protocol implementation in 'Connection.Protocol.VNC.cs' to enable view-only mode, and expose a UI toggle for this property in the 'ConnectionInfoPropertyGrid' used by 'ConfigWindow.cs'.
